law.catch_line: A peddler license authorizes the holder to act as a peddler only in the county where the peddler lic...

text.section: A peddler license authorizes the holder to act as a peddler only in the county where the peddler license is issued.

In Harford County, a peddler may not sell goods on:
a county right-of-way; or
a State right-of-way, unless the peddler gets a lease agreement from the appropriate State unit.
